title: Under-Cabinet Kitchen Lighting, Oversized Energy-Efficient Windows
posting_body: ['Please feel free to Call or TEXT us for any info or to schedule a tour!', 'Prices and Availability subject to change.', 'Welcome to Capstone at Vallagio', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 34', 'OR Text', '34', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1033 Sq.', 'Ft.', "Experience deluxe urban living at Englewood's newest luxury apartment community, Capstone at Vallagio.", 'Come home to expansive mountain views and the stylish, thoughtful details of our studio, one- and two-bedroom apartment homes.', 'Capstone is adjacent to the Denver Tech Center and the Dry Creek Light Rail Station is a 1/2 block away on the covered pedestrian sky bridge.', 'With access to I-25 less than a quarter mile away and a nice selection of restaurants within walking distance, Capstone at Vallagio keeps you close to the action while also delivering a relaxing retreat for times when you just want to unwind.', 'How well you choose to live is your decision.', 'Choose to live well at Capstone.', 'Features:', 'Two-Inch Blinds, Mosaic Tile Backsplashes*, Custom Track Lighting, Spacious Walk-In Closets with Custom Organizers, Gourmet Kitchens, Programmable Thermostats, Open-Concept Design, Ceiling Fans, Oversized Energy-Efficient Windows, Front-Loading Washer and Dryer in Each Home, Dramatic 9-Foot Ceilings, Wood-Style Flooring, Under-Cabinet Kitchen Lighting, Quartz Countertops, Upgraded Stainless-Steel Appliance Package, Energy-Efficient Windows, Stand-Up Glass Showers with Built-In Seat, Personal Balconies*, Expansive Mountain Views*, Air Conditioning, Custom Espresso Cabinetry with Deluxe Hardware', 'Community Amenities:', 'Wired for Technology, Convenient Elevator Locations, Resident Lounge with 80-Inch Flat-Panel HD TV, 24-Hour Fitness Center with Top-of-the-Line Equipment, Controlled-Access Community, Wi-Fi in Clubroom and Pool Area, Bicycle Storage Available, Walking Distance to Dry Creek Light Rail Station, Onsite Recycling Program, Green Friendly Community, Media Center with Computer Stations, Underground Parking Garage, Resort-Inspired Heated Pool and Spa, Community Barbecue Area, Additional Onsite Storage Available*, Demonstration Kitchen with Community Table and Coffee Bar, 1/4 Mile to I-25 Freeway, Outdoor Lounge with Fireplace and Cozy Seating', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet-friendly community - call or text us for info!', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'npVG8QmASj']
